about_the_game:
An army of aliens is here to invade the Earth! Show the Earth-style greeting to those unwanted visitors who lounge around our grounds! You, as the commander, must lead your troops to extinguish zillions of aliens!

◆Combat and Medicine

Soldiers wounded in a battle can be healed by retreating to a medic truck. But what happens to the rest of the troops left in the battleground with fewer fighters...? Assess the battle situation accurately and prevent the battle line from collapsing!

Cannons are one handy way to assist your soldiers in combat! Using them also allows you to make use of the various objects placed on the battlefield. Who knows if a single cannonball could flip the battle situation? Aim well and fire like a boss!

◆Mind your troops' well being too!

Being sent to an intense battlefield causes many kinds of trauma. A physical is one of them... and mental is another. Do not underestimate the "Stress"... it can lead your troops to panic during combat, and even worse, refuse to head to the battlefield. Show your soldiers some compassion and let them rest in the base once in a while!

◆Boost up your troops!

Soldiers will strive to gain more power by acquiring skills through training. They can also mod their bodies to achieve a kind of power that no human could ever hope for. But keep in mind... Inhumane powers means an inhumane mind. Can you sacrifice your troops' dignity to victory?
